title: Santo: Aore Island Resort
inclusions_evidence: Includes 6 nights at Aore Island Resort - Return airport/boat transfers - Tropical breakfast daily - Use of bikes, kayaks and SUP's - Wi-Fi in restaurant and lounge area - Cultural nightly entertainment; Per Person, from $1,088

items.label: Use of bikes, kayaks and SUPs
Wi-Fi in restaurant and lounge area
Tourism levy VT100 per room per night (payable direct)

other.notes: All 'other' item prices could not be independently sourced. The page states a tourism levy of VT100 per room per night payable direct.

reasoning: Cannot reliably obtain DIY prices from booking platforms with provided data, so numeric comparison is not possible. The package includes 6 nights, return airport/boat transfers, daily breakfast and complimentary activities (bikes, kayaks, SUPs) which add tangible value especially for a remote island property; flights are not included and a tourism levy is payable on checkout, which reduces net value. Given inclusions and likely higher standalone cost for transfers/activities at Aore Island, this appears to be a good mid-high value hotel-only package, but unable to quantify savings.
additional_notes: If flights to Luganville/Santo are sourced separately they could materially affect total trip cost; to confirm this deal as a top-10 bargain, independent price pulls from airlines and hotel booking sites are required.
